duties_responsibilities.duty: Own, report, maintain and file/pay our property accounting functions
Own and maintain the amortization and reporting for PPD Assets.
Own and maintain the monthly accrual and reporting for Workers Compensation and General Liability insurance.
Assist in the weekly booking of ADP Payroll Journal Entries.
Act as a liaison between Corporate and the Landlord for Rent/Property Taxes.
Ad hoc reporting and analysis as needed for leadership. Work closely with team members on various month-end close activities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or Finance (Master's preferred)
